name: Technical Fabric Sculpture #4
description:
Technical Fabric sculptures are a mix of analog and digital processes with Virtual Reality abstract drawing. I bring a reference of a video still into the VR program Gravity Sketch and use the reference to add lines and shapes to enhance/bring to life the original rescan. All reference images were made with video hardware/mixers with internal video feedback and rescanned off a CRT monitor with a digital camera. The Stills and Virtual Reality drawings are united together in Photoshop. 

3360 x 2100 pixels
